name: Meade Kincke
bio: I love real-world, usable examples. I'm a huge fan of being able to help others to make something work how it should with maximum performance. I especially love Rust and have written a tool called BrewStillery in it and GTK-rs.

name: Brooks J Rady
bio: A functional programmer who loves Haskell, Lisp, Rust, and Elixir.

name: Brenton Alker
bio: Rust brings an expressive type-system to low-level perfomance and portability. The WASM support ties in particularly well with web development where I spend most of my time and I'm excited to join others on this learning path.

name: Thayne McCombs
bio: Although rust does have a steeper learning curve than many other languages, once you understand it, it is a truly incredible language.
